mapper.sql: id, pay_chan_code,pay_chan_name, merchat_acct, mcode,mkey, is_off, err_no,notify_url, create_time, update_time
mapper.update: update merchant_payment_channel set pay_chan_code = #{payChanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_chan_name = #{payChanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchat_acct = #{merchatAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mcode = #{mcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mkey = #{mkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_off = #{isOff,jdbcType=INTEGER}, err_no = #{errNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, notify_url = #{notifyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: from merchant_payment_channel where pay_chan_code = #{payChanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and merchat_acct = #{merchatAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
